snippet: The United States added 151,000 jobs last month, which was below expectations, leading analysts to believe an interest-rate increase is less likely this month....
abstract: Stocks rise as investors draw confidence from middling August jobs report that infers interest rate hike is unwarranted.
lead_paragraph: The United States added 151,000 jobs last month, which was below expectations, leading analysts to believe an interest-rate increase is less likely this month.

headline.main: Wall St. Ends Higher as Jobs Report Stokes Hopes for Low Rates
headline.print_headline: Wall Street Up After Moderately Strong Jobs Report
